passage_text: Meaning of Florentino. Spanish name. In Spanish, the name Florentino means-blooming.The name Florentino originated as an Spanish name. The name Florentino is most often used as a boy name or male name. Spanish Name Meaning-blooming.

The name Florentino is a Spanish baby name. In Spanish the meaning of the name Florentino is: Blooming. SoulUrge Number: 8. Expression Number: 11. People with this name have a deep inner desire to lead, organize, supervise, and to achieve status, power and wealth.

[ 4 syll. flo-ren-ti-no, fl-orent-ino ] The baby boy name Florentino is pronounced FLowRehNT IY-Now †. Florentino is of Latin origin and it is used mainly in the English language. Florentino is a derivative of the German Florentin. Florentino is uncommon as a baby name for boys.

Florentino /flo-ren-ti-no/ [4 sylls.] as a boys' name. Florentino's root is Old French, and the meaning of the name Florentino is in flower. Florentino is a variant transcription of Florent (Old French): the feminine transcription is Florence. Compare surname Florentine. Kreatif forms: Fielrentino, Florentico.
